TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program please help me with Umbra's parts

Articles.Content: So before making this post I checked all over the internet for the specific "UmbraSpaceIndustries/ExpPack/SciencePack/Parts/RadioPlasmaWaveScience/USI_RadioPlasmaWaveScience" and I can't find the download for it anywhere please help. I have 90 mods that worked before no problem. All compatible with version 1.8 which is what I have preffered to run. Any advice for this loading screen fix? It won't load that^ would've insterted a screenshot but it locks the controls on that screen.
